The video has been viewed more than 12: 000 times on Facebook since its publication on May 9, 2020.
The video shows a convoy of military veh: with an explosion occurring at the 15-second mark.
The caption of the video: translated from Arakanese to English, mentions the attack on "Four of seven 'Fish Paste Thieves' trucks" by the Arakan Army (AA) in Buthidaung, resulting in the deaths of at least 40 soldiers.
Reverse image searches on Google reveale: a website associated with the Kurdistan Workers' Party (PKK), showing an attack on a Turkish military convoy in Semdinli, Turkey.
